product_name: Mavic Ksyrium Equipe S Front Wheel
long_description: Mavic Ksyrium Equipe S front bike wheel delivers a fine balance between weight savings and strength and durability for an excellent, all-around wheel that won't break your budget. Semi-aerodynamic 24mm deep rim is strengthened where the spokes exert the greatest stress to deliver lasting performance. Rim features a milled braking surface to improve friction; rim joint is welded and milled to eliminate shuddering during braking and provide great wheel balance. Hub uses double-sealed cartridge bearings to deliver excellent longevity and smooth spinning. 20 straight-pull, bladed steel spokes are laced radially for a balance between strength and weight savings. Yksion Comp 700x23c clincher tire is included; tire has supple 120 tpi casing and is backed with a puncture-resistant nylon breaker. Please note: tube uses a Presta valve; maximum recommended pressure of 140 psi (10 bar). Mavic Kysrium Equipe S front wheel comes with a quick-release skewer and rim tape; 100mm front axle spacing. Mavic recommended maximum combined weight of the cyclist, bike and equipment is 220 lbs. (100kg).
short_description: Mavic Ksyrium Equipe S front bike wheel delivers a fine balance between weight savings and strength and durability for an excellent, all-around wheel that won't break your budget.
